Posts.Content: I know Xeloda goes on your weight. My oncologist has me taking 500mg 4 times a day. The 150mg 2 twice a day. That is 2,300mg a day for 2 weeks then off one week. My weight is 330 lbs. Thanks for your feedback.
Posts.Title: Dosage on Xeloda

Posts.Content: Are you talking about "Xeloda". I'm going to start on this pill this Thursday. I heard that was one of the side effects. Does your sister have anything for nausea? Compazine and Phenergan is very good. ( Makes you sleepy). Zofrain works well (this doesnot make you sleepy). Is this the only side effect she has? Keep in touch and I will be praying for her.
Posts.Title: Xelode
